note.p: Birth: Newcastle upon Tyne, Northumberland, England (06 February 1830)
Education: Society of Friends' School, Brookfield, Wigton
Career: Began working at Kew Gardens (1858); Keeper of the Herbarium and Library (1864); Professor of Botany, University College, London (1861-1888)
Obituaries: Proc Roy Soc Series B 1917-1919 vol 90 pp xi-xv, plate, signed by W B H
